settings.function.windowControl.windowTi: Set the title bar text for the target window

settings.function.screenshot.title: Screenshot Settings

settings.function.letterbox.title: Letterbox Mode
settings.function.letterbox.description: Add black borders around the target window when enabled
settings.function.letterbox.enabled.desc: Provide an immersive experience for windows with non-native aspect ratios
